name: refundable

If an amount of money is refundable, it can be given back to the person who paid it, for example because they need to change their plans: Tickets are not refundable. The charge includes a refundable security deposit. See
refund
More examplesFewer examplesYour legal costs will be refundable if you win.Shipping and handling fees are non refundable.This fare is fully refundable.
